name: Why Do I...?
description:
A semi sequel to Why Even Bother?
It's a bit less autobiographical, and a bit more general.
And it's quite a bit less bleak than that game was.
And will probably make more sense to more people.

Controls - Arrow keys to move/advance text, walk into things to interact with them.

Art and music is by me, Amber Rose.

Made in Bitsy https://ledoux.itch.io/bitsy
Music made with PXTone https://studiopixel.jp/pxtone/
Uses Bitsy hacks made by David Mowatt, Sean S. LeBlanc, and @mildmojo
You can find those hacks and more at https://github.com/seleb/bitsy-hacks
